data.message: Facebook new messenger is an Invasion to your Personal privacy..Scary is That they know every single move u made...

replies.message: Hey DjCarlos. We hear your concern—many of the reports about Messenger app permissions simply aren't true. Learn more about how we actually use permissions for Messenger: http://on.fb.me/1phbojR  -Kristen

If you're hearing everyone's concerns and complaints, why don't you just go ahead and admit you screwed up and reverse your decision? Everyone will be much happier if you did that. I've deleted your app because of these stupid decisions.
Agreed, so not downloading this crazy spy app!  If I take a video of my kids I don't want strangers looking at it and then start sending me kids clothing ads!

Can someone enlighten me why am I being harassed by facebook to delete my account?  When I signed up, there was no harassment...now that I want my account deleted, I am questioned and harassed to get it done.
